data.name: Attack on Titan Mashup Set
data.detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


Important Notice

The sale of this content will be discontinued after July 18th, 2017 (JST). You will still be able to continue to use the content you have already purchased.


About the Game

The spectacular action and immense scale of Attack on Titan come to Dead or Alive! Characters in Dead or Alive 5 Last Round can now wear the uniforms of the Military Police Regiment, Garrison Regiment, Scout Regiment, or the Cadet Corps. Proudly wear the uniform of a regiment and dedicate your heart to saving humanity from utter annihilation! This set contains all 30 Attack on Titan Mashup costumes. Note: The costume damage feature is not available on the Steam system version. Content included: Attack on Titan Mashup - Kasumi (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Ayane (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Marie Rose (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Honoka (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Nyotengu (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Kokoro (Cadet Corps) Attack on Titan Mashup - Hitomi (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Momiji (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Helena (Garrison Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Leifang (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Tina (Military Police Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Phase 4 (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Mila (Cadet Corps) Attack on Titan Mashup - La Mariposa (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Rachel (Military Police Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Christie (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Alpha‐152 (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Ryu Hayabusa (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Hayate (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Ein (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Raidou (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Jann Lee (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Zack (Cadet Corps) Attack on Titan Mashup - Bayman (Military Police Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Bass (Garrison Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Brad Wong (Garrison Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Eliot (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Rig (Scout Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Gen Fu (Garrison Regiment) Attack on Titan Mashup - Leon (Scout Regiment) *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content. *The Attack on Titan stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game.
data.about_the_game:
The spectacular action and immense scale of Attack on Titan come to Dead or Alive! Characters in Dead or Alive 5 Last Round can now wear the uniforms of the Military Police Regiment, Garrison Regiment, Scout Regiment, or the Cadet Corps. Proudly wear the uniform of a regiment and dedicate your heart to saving humanity from utter annihilation!

This set contains all 30 Attack on Titan Mashup costumes.

Note: The costume damage feature is not available on the Steam system version.

Content included:
Attack on Titan Mashup - Kasumi (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Ayane (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Marie Rose (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Honoka (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Nyotengu (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Kokoro (Cadet Corps)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Hitomi (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Momiji (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Helena (Garrison Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Leifang (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Tina (Military Police Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Phase 4 (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Mila (Cadet Corps)
Attack on Titan Mashup - La Mariposa (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Rachel (Military Police Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Christie (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Alpha‐152 (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Ryu Hayabusa (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Hayate (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Ein (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Raidou (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Jann Lee (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Zack (Cadet Corps)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Bayman (Military Police Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Bass (Garrison Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Brad Wong (Garrison Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Eliot (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Rig (Scout Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Gen Fu (Garrison Regiment)
Attack on Titan Mashup - Leon (Scout Regiment)

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
*The Attack on Titan stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game.
data.short_description:
This set contains all 30 Attack on Titan Mashup costumes.
Note: The costume damage feature is not available on the Steam system version.

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
*The Attack on Titan stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
